author: cnbc.com
title: CECO Environmental Announces Fourth Quarter and Fiscal 2017 Results Conference Call
text:
DALLAS, Feb. 26, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- CECO Environmental Corp. (Nasdaq: CECE ) will host a conference call on Thursday, March 8, 2018 at 7:30 a.m. CT to discuss the Company's fourth quarter and fiscal 2017 financial results.
The Company's financial results will be issued in a press release before the market opens on March 8, 2018 and posted on the Company's website at http://www.cecoenviro.com . Please visit the website to listen to the call via webcast. The conference call may also be accessed by dialing 877-870-4263 (Toll-Free) within the U.S., 855-669-9657 (Toll-Free) within Canada or Toll/International 412-317-0790.
A replay of the conference call will be available on the Company's website for 14 days. The replay may be accessed by dialing 877-344-7529 (Toll-Free) within the U.S., 855-669-9658 (Toll-Free) within Canada, or Toll/International 412-317-0088 and entering access code 10117555.
A BOU T CECO ENVIRONMENTAL
CECO Environmental is a global leader in air quality and fluid handling serving the energy, industrial and other niche markets. Providing innovative technology and application expertise, CECO helps companies grow their business with safe, clean and more efficient solutions that help protect our shared environment. In regions around the world, CECO works to improve air quality, optimize the energy value chain and provide custom engineered solutions for applications including oil and gas, power generation, water and wastewater, battery production, poly silicon fabrication, chemical and petrochemical processing along with a range of others. CECO is listed on Nasdaq under the ticker symbol "CECE". For more information, please visit www.cecoenviro.com .
